text: Matteo Rossi (born 11 July 1975 in Genoa) is an Italian retired footballer. He played as a defender. He played from 1982 for Genoa youth teams. He made his debut in Serie A on 15 April 1995 with Genoa against Cagliari. He played 67' after being replaced by Kazuyoshi Miura. On 21 May he played his second Serie A match against Foggia and his team won 3–0. At the end of the season Genoa was relegated in Serie B, where Matteo played one match. He continued his career in lower series. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Genoa Category:Genoa C.F.C. players Category:Spezia Calcio players Category:F.S. title: Matteo Rossi
